name: Grand Hypercube Axiom
intent: Define the complete 12D commutative hyper-structure of all IGSOA/MBC operators.
domain: Operator set {δ, Φ, Π, μ, ψ, λ, Σ, Θ, χ, Ω, ρ, Ξ}.
axiom: Every 2D face generated by any operator pair (A,B) commutes in global normal form: NF\_12(A∘B) \= NF\_12(B∘A).
Every finite chain A1∘...∘An reduces uniquely to NF\_12 under the rewrite system.
All Tier families (1–12) embed as lower-dimensional slices of this hypercube.
All meta-operators preserve the commutative hypercube structure.
constraints: Rewrite termination is guaranteed; no infinite sequences.
Confluence: all rewrite paths lead to NF\_12.
Ξ serves as the boundary unifier for high-tier structures.
